reviews.review: Игра Классная кто ещё не играл советую!
Стоит копейки а уровень игры на высоте
Absoloute best series ever, 10/10 would reccommend.

Qué puedo decir de esta obra maestra?
Portal 2 es para mi en mi opinión, de los mejores juegos de Valve y una belleza de juego.
Y ahora aprovechando que esta en descuento, debes ahora mismo comprarlo junto con el Portal 1, en serio, compralo.

Pues que te digo... 

Es Portal 2, no te arrepentirás. 

¡Y lo puedes correr en una tostadora!
at the end of the game, you do what every cryptocurrency wants to do
Não se precisa gostar de jogos de puzzle para amar esse jogo
very fun for a older game

História incrível, jogabilidade ótima, bons puzzles. Portal 2 é um excelente game pra passar o tempo e se divertir com os amigos quebrando a cabeça pra tentar passar das fases.

Nota final: 10/10
amazing game i spent a lot of time speedruning, beating and overall a amazing game for people who have too much time to waste.

Das Spiel beleidigt mich pausenlos, nimmt mir jegliches Selbstwertgefühl und sorgt für Investitionen in Rasierklingen.

11/10
jogo muito bom, os graficos e a ambentalização, tanto quanto a historia fazem você querer jogar de novo
Makes my brain go a little bit bigger.

Oooh I love this game
It's cinfusing af but the best story ever. Got plot twists and shit!

Great Game.
Puzzles are exceptional.  The story line is entertaining  and unique.  Characters  are interesting and not annoying.  After 10 years I Still enjoy going back to it once in a while. It's a fun game.  when you finish the main campaign, there are a lot of very well developed mods.
The co-op community is still very active.
No Complaints.

This game is even more challenging and I absolutely think that it's amazing! This game gives you double the puzzles, double the challenges. Portal 2 NAILED its sequel and I believe it's just as iconic as Portal. And when you hear that, you know they really put the time and effort into making this game.
Hello again and welcome to the aperture science laboratory

Tengo dicotomías con este juego por sus altísimas ambiciones a pesar de ser muy derivativa.
Pero de algo estoy muy seguro que... este es el videojuego  con la mejor interpretación vocal y actoral de todo el medio, tanto en doblaje como en voces originales. 
Los actores interpretan tan bien las variaciones de personalidad en una comunicación mayormente unidireccional, parcialmente justificada, que toma más peso en final. 
Estos personajes que tambalean en lo trágico-cómico (contextualizando más con el cómic), y peor aun siendo unos robots expresan mayor carga expresiva propia que el harto repertorio de personajes serios y grises del canon gamer.

Portal 2 is a great story game, and the Steam workshop community makes it even better! The custom workshop levels in Portal 2 show how creative people can really get with their minds. The Co-Op mode is downright amazing and helps both friends and families make great memories over a spectacular game with a fantastic plot and story!
I used to play this game on the Xbox when I was a kid and it really never gets old. Hours of gameplay and fun co-op features, it makes me feel smart playing it.

Uno de los mejores juegos que ha echo Valve, su historia es increible. supera con creces al primer juego en todos los aspectos y tiene un cooperativo divertidisimo. ademas esta super bien optimizado, hasta mi computadora del gobierno podría correrlo.
i like commiting hate crimes against my partner in science
imagine portal but like a second part of it
다른 게임에서는 볼 수 없는 경험을 제공합니다.

One of my favourite puzzle games! Portal 2 has a great story, witty dialogue and fun game play. The puzzles themselves are fairly easy to solve but still take some thought, which stops it from feeling stale. I absolutely love the co-op chapters. I can even play them with friends who are completely new to Portal and the difficulty in levels scales well, making it a fun experience for both of us! 
Definitely buy this if you're interested in puzzle-solving and deadly British robots, even if you haven't played the first Portal game, you'll still enjoy this one :)
Great, fun, entertaining, infuriating puzzle game!
very good game but thats no surprise

One of the best endings in any game I have played before. The puzzles are solid, and the environments are jaw-dropping. The introduction of the gel and the transportation beams/light bridges were amazing mechanics compared to Portal 1. With an incredibly compelling story and the accessibility of the game, it's a game that can be played at any pace, is generally amusing, and is simply accessible to nearly anybody. Not to mention, there is a co-op mode and it is very fun with a friend.
Amazing game! As always, Valve made it again.
portal 2 is a cool game and since theres a sale now you should buy it! edit: i started a new game and it deleted my old save file without telling me ):

I am going to be honest, the first time I played this game it was a "less than legitimate" copy of the game I had on a flash drive given to me in high school. But when I played the game for the first time on that school laptop with a 7 inch screen and an i3 processor, I loved it. And since now I have disposable income, I got this game pretty much as soon as I got my new PC set up. It took me a while to get to it, but I finished it again on a proper desktop. And I must say, this is easily my favorite video game that I have ever played. Great writing, jokes, puzzles, and artistic composition. And all of these things are just as stunning the second time, and I am sure they will be on every other subsequent replay. My absolute favorite part of this game is the scale, as every time you get to see into the bowels of Aperture, you are taken aback by the horror and beauty of the abyss. Also I like the part with the potato, but that is all I'll say about it so it doesn't spoil the fun. Get this game alongside the first Portal, they are absolute necessary plays for anyone in my opinion.
Where is Portal 3? I NEED MORE

Помнишь, я говорила тебе про мусор, который стоит... стоит и смердит без всякой пользы? Это была метафора. Я имела в виду тебя. И я прошу прощения. Ты не отреагировала сразу, и я забеспокоилась, что ты пропустила это мимо ушей. Тогда извинения выглядели бы чем-то ненормальным. Поэтому я только что снова назвала тебя мусором.

Эта игра просто очаровательная! 
Она ещё на релизе очень сильно меня впечатлило.
Как по мне эта игра хороша, даже шедеврально в некоторых аспектах: атмосфера; забавный юмор; головоломки; персонажи - всё это сделано с душой. 
Я решил перепройти её перед новым годом, и я очень доволен потраченным временем, советую!
cool game, cool story, cool mechanics, endless gameplay. fun
If there's one thing this game is good at, it's making me feel like I've got 200 IQ
das spiel ist sehr gut weil es spiele in solcher art nicht gibt und decher das im ersten teil jur portale benutzt wurden wirds hier schewerer weill es nun gälle gibt
i like slamming myself into walls in this game
Охуеть, можно за пивасиком из дома сразу в магаз пойти

Игра однозначно шедевр. Но, я бы в редактор добавил возможность менять вид комнаты, ведь во время игры можно увидеть 3 разных образа комплекса: первый это старый (перед пробуждением Гладос), второй это тот который доступен сейчас и третий это старый комплекс (там куда нас вместе с Гладос кидает Уитли). Ну и может быть побольше предметов для редактора тоже (например пластины с шипами).
